name: Journey to the Center of the Earth (2003)

game.exe: drive_c/Program Files/Frogwares/Journey to the Center of the Earth/JourneyToTheCenterOfTheEarth.exe

content:
files:
- file1: N/A:Please select the Groupees archive
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/Frogwares/Journey to the Center of the Earth/JourneyToTheCenterOfTheEarth.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    file: $file1
- task:
    args: /sp- /verysilent /norestart /suppressmsgboxes /nogui
    executable: $CACHE/JTCE-EN_setup.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
